topics.body:
Remember when we thought Disney was going to buy up Hasbro?

"Hasbro in Talks to Buy DreamWorks Animation":http://www.equestriadaily.com/2014/11/hasbro-in-talks-to-buy-dreamworks.html
It seems Hasbro is in just as voracious appetite to buy up studios as competitor Disney.

What do you think they're going to do with Dreamworks under their helm? I think it's likely Transformers related. But who knows?

The best part is the end of the final battle.
You see the creator's own QTE events as he tries to stop you and how he keeps on missing. He's trying to use the games own combat system to beat you.
*And it doesn't work.*
